annotations: Objective: To obtain a position as a machine operator. Prideful, passionate hard working, team player with fifteen years of experience as a machine operator.
Skills: Supervised operation various types of extruding machines, repair, verify quality of production, trainee personnel in operation, maintain records.

MPI Industries
1211 Bernard Drive
Slitter Assistant, 8/2015 – Present

The Slitter Assistant is responsible for supporting the slitter operator during the slitting/rewinding. Inspection and data collection process of finished product being sent to /Finished Goods, while consistently meeting Company demands and specifications. Ensure daily activities are conducted at all times in a safe and proper manner. Working overtime as workload, personnel schedules or Customer demands suggest. Maintaining the work area in a clean and orderly condition. Set up equipment, at the direction of the Slitter Operator, based on job specifications, to meet appropriate requirements of the finished label. Communicate any set up issues to the Slitter Operator. Perform quality checks prior to production and monitor print quality during production. Communicate any potential quality issues to the Slitter Operator. Then move the completed rolls by Forklift to the appropriate section

Pall Filtration
Greenspring Dr. Timonium, MD.
Extruder Operator, 4/1997 – 4/2012

Nexus Department: maintain line as machine operator, filling orders, capping, packaging filters. Extruding and drawing machine setters, operators, and tenders, metal and plastic. Take & dispose of defected filters, feed, repair, test equipment with weight, diameters and air quality test. Clean work area. Assist in other departments. Fill in when need.

VA Medical Center
Tucson, AZ
Landscaping/Maintenance 6/1996 -9/1996

Irrigating, planting and troubleshooting of grounds outside of VA hospital. Working under minimum supervision. Executed small scale landscaping operations, prepared & graded terrain, applied fertilizer seated lawns, and transplanted scrubs and plants. Using manual power operated equipment, cultivated plants and lawns. Planted new & repaired established lawns using seeds mixture & fertilizing and recommended for particular soil type and location, planted scrubs, trees and flowers selected by owners. Trim and clean grounds. Dug drainage & installed drain tiles sprinkler systems.

Rockland Industries, Inc.
Edison Highway Baltimore, MD
Machine Attendant 1/1992 – 11/1995

Provide support to machines while a mixture of fabric extrudes. Exam for defected or damages. Repair line. Use specialized sawing machine for repairs. Observe as clothes winds onto rolls or passes through attachment. Measure clothes with ruler to match qualifications for weight and dryness.

Education:
US Navy: E3 Airman/Aviation Ordinance Man 1987-1991
Navy Unit Commendations. Can provide DD214
Verified amount of ordinance the Air Wing needed to place on the Aircraft. Maintain accountability logs of bomb inventory.

Northern High School Diploma 1984-1987
Baltimore, MD
